item.title: 日本 Fanuc 公司称，由于关税的不确定性，公司无法提供 2025/26 财年的业绩预测
item.description: 日本机器人公司发那科公司（Fanuc Corp）周三表示，由于包括美国关税及其全球经济影响在内的 "诸多不确定因素"，该公司无法报告截至2026年3月的本财年的业绩预测。【原文：Japanese robotics company Fanuc Corp said on Wednesday it was not able to report its forecasts for the current fiscal year ending in March 2026 due to "numerous uncertain factors" including U.S. tariffs and their global economic impact.】

item.title: 日产高管表示将在中国追加 14 亿美元投资
item.description: 日产汽车公司负责中国业务的高管 Stephen Ma 周三表示，到 2026 年底，该公司将在中国追加 100 多亿元人民币（13.7 亿美元）的投资。【原文：Nissan Motor will make an additional investment of more than 10 billion yuan ($1.37 billion) in China by the end of 2026, Stephen Ma, an executive overseeing China operations at the automaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺华和赛诺菲首席执行官表示，面对关税，欧盟应提高药品价格
item.description: 两家欧洲制药巨头的老板在周三发表在《金融时报》上的一封信中说，为了吸引投资，欧盟应该允许药品价格上涨到美国的水平。【原文：The European Union should allow drug prices to rise to U.S. levels in order to attract investment, the bosses of two European pharmaceutical giants said in a letter published in the Financial Times on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本央行称日本银行需在金融市场波动中保持警惕
item.description: 日本央行周三表示，由于贸易政策的不确定性导致全球金融市场波动加剧，日本的银行需要警惕各种风险。【原文：Japanese banks need to watch out various risks as the volatility in global financial markets has increased due to uncertainties over trade policies, the Bank of Japan said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汽车制造商广汽集团将对 L4 自动驾驶汽车的安全负责，Jiemian 报道
item.description: 据中国媒体《晶报》报道，中国汽车制造商广州汽车集团（GAC）周三在上海车展上表示，将对四级自动驾驶汽车的安全负责。【原文：Chinese carmaker Guangzhou Automobile Group (GAC) said at the Shanghai auto show on Wednesday it would take responsibility for the safety of Level 4 autonomous driving vehicles, Chinese media outlet Jiemian reported.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价上涨 6.5%，马斯克表示将减少 DOGE 工作
item.description: 特斯拉周三在法兰克福股价上涨 6.5%，此前该公司报告称，第一季度其核心汽车业务的盈利能力超过了最低预期，但在收入和净利润等其他指标上未能达到预期。【原文：Tesla shares rose 6.5% in Frankfurt on Wednesday, after it reported profitability for its core auto business topped rock-bottom expectations in the first quarter, although it missed on other metrics such as revenue and net profit.】

item.title: 分析师称英国石油公司股票回购前景面临油价下滑风险
item.description: 分析师说，除非油价回升，否则英国石油公司明年可能被迫削减甚至取消股票回购计划。【原文：BP may be forced to cut or even scrap its share buyback programmes over the next year unless oil prices recover, analysts say, adding that would increase pressure on its already underperforming shares.】

item.title: 智璞 AI 在上市前加强海外扩张战略
item.description: 中国智璞人工智能公司（Zhipu AI）的一位高管周三表示，该公司正通过与阿里巴巴云的合作加速海外扩张，为首次公开募股做准备。【原文：China's Zhipu AI is ramping up its overseas expansion through a partnership with Alibaba Cloud, an executive said on Wednesday, as the startup prepares for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国电动车巨头比亚迪在战略失误后重启欧洲业务
item.description: 比亚迪六位现任和前任高管表示，中国领先的电动汽车制造商比亚迪在战略上出现失误，包括未能签约足够多的经销商，未能聘请了解当地市场的高管，以及未能在抵制全电动汽车的市场上提供混合动力车，因此比亚迪正在全面整顿其在欧洲的业务。【原文：China's leading EV maker BYD is overhauling its European operations after strategic missteps including failures to sign up enough dealers and hire executives with local-market knowledge and to offer hybrids in markets resistant to fully electric vehicles, six current and former BYD executives said.】

item.title: 阿克苏诺贝尔第一季度利润增长
item.description: 多乐士（Dulux）涂料生产商阿克苏诺贝尔（Akzo Nobel）周三公布的第一季度核心利润下降了 1.7%，超出预期，原因是成本削减和定价提高。【原文：Dulux paint maker Akzo Nobel reported a 1.7% drop in its first-quarter core profit on Wednesday, beating expectations, citing cost reductions and higher pricing.】

item.title: 沃尔沃卡车利润降幅超预期，下调北美市场前景展望
item.description: 瑞典卡车制造商沃尔沃公司（AB Volvo）周三公布的第一季度营业利润降幅大于预期，并下调了2025年北美卡车市场前景。【原文：Swedish truck maker AB Volvo reported a bigger-than-expected fall in first-quarter operating profit on Wednesday and lowered its North America truck market outlook for 2025.】

item.title: 亚洲人工智能需求回升，Besi 公布预订量增加
item.description: 荷兰芯片零部件供应商必益半导体工业公司（Besi）周三表示，由于来自亚洲分包商的人工智能相关数据中心应用订单回升，作为未来增长重要指标的订单量比上一季度增长了8.2%。【原文：Dutch chipmaking parts supplier BE Semiconductor Industries (Besi) said on Wednesday that its order bookings, an important indicator of future growth, rose 8.2% against last quarter as orders from Asian subcontractors for AI related data centre applications picked up.】

item.title: 关税动荡导致瑞郎飙升，迫使瑞士央行采取行动
item.description: 由于美国政策的不确定性，瑞士法郎的快速升值可能会迫使瑞士国家银行很快进行干预，因为瑞士工业界希望避险货币的飙升能够在对受到关税威胁的行业造成新的打击之前得到控制。【原文：The Swiss franc's rapid appreciation on U.S. policy uncertainty could force the Swiss National Bank to intervene soon, as Swiss industry hopes the safe haven currency's surge can be tamed before it deals another blow to a tariff-threatened sector.】

item.title: 瑞士太阳能电池板制造商 Meyer Burger 削减德国生产基地工人的工作时间
item.description: 瑞士太阳能电池板制造商 Meyer Burger 周三表示，由于暂时的材料瓶颈，该公司将从 5 月 1 日起削减德国工厂约 300 名员工的工作时间。【原文：Swiss solar panel maker Meyer Burger will cut hours for some 300 employees at its plant in Germany starting on May 1 due to temporary material bottlenecks, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 百度推出安卓平台人工智能代理 "心象"，iOS 版本正在审核中
item.description: 中国搜索引擎巨头百度周二推出了一款人工智能代理 "心语"，称它能比聊天机器人服务更有效地帮助用户完成信息分析和旅行计划等任务。【原文：Chinese search engine giant Baidu launched on Tuesday an AI agent Xinxiang, which it said can help users run tasks such as information analysis and plan travel more efficiently than using a chatbot service.】

item.title: OPmobility 实施应对美国关税的计划
item.description: 法国汽车供应商 OPmobility 首席执行官洛朗-法夫尔（Laurent Favre）周二在与记者的通话中表示，该公司计划采取成本削减措施，以应对美国关税的影响。【原文：OPmobility plans cost reduction measures to deal with the impact of U.S. tariffs, the French car supplier's CEO Laurent Favre said in a call with journalists on Tuesday.】

item.title: 瑞士在华盛顿关税会议前展示金融实力
item.description: 在制药巨头罗氏公司（Roche）紧随其同城竞争对手诺华公司（Novartis）宣布在美国进行重大投资之后，瑞士高层官员本周将测试对美国的重大承诺是否有助于获得进口关税减免。【原文：Top Swiss officials will this week test whether big commitments to the U.S. can help secure relief from import tariffs, after pharma giant Roche followed its cross-town rival Novartis in announcing major investments in the United States.】

item.title: 国泰航空预计关税影响将降低中美航空货运需求
item.description: 亚洲最大的航空货运公司之一国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways）周三表示，随着华盛顿和中国政府之间关税上调的影响逐渐显现，该公司预计中国大陆和美国之间的航空货运需求将出现疲软。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways , one of Asia's largest air freight carriers, expects air cargo demand between mainland China and the United States. to soften as tariff hikes between Washington and Beijing take hold, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 送货英雄退出泰国
item.description: 德国食品配送公司 Delivery Hero 周三表示，该公司在亚洲的业务 foodpanda 将于 5 月 23 日停止在泰国的平台运营。【原文：Delivery Hero's Asia-based business foodpanda is to stop operating its platform in Thailand on May 23, the German food delivery firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贸易战和安全问题成为上海车展的焦点
item.description: 在中国这个全球最大的汽车市场上，一年一度的大型车展已成为越来越便宜、性能越来越好的电动汽车和越来越自信的本土品牌崛起的展示舞台。【原文：China's annual major auto shows have become a showcase for the rise of ever-cheaper, better-performing electric vehicles and more confident local brands in the world's biggest market for cars.】

item.title: 早间竞价特朗普的美联储后空翻引发救市反弹
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 印度 HCLTech 因收入增长前景强劲而跳涨
item.description: 印度第三大 IT 公司 HCLTech 公布了强劲的收入增长预期，在受大型竞争对手谨慎前景拖累的行业中脱颖而出，该公司股票周三大涨 8%。【原文：Shares of HCLTech jumped 8% on Wednesday after India's third-largest IT firm delivered a strong revenue growth forecast, standing out in a sector weighed down by cautious outlooks from bigger rivals.】

item.title: 中国汽车品牌 Lynk & Co 表示，即将推出的 900 车型收到了超过 40,000 份预订单
item.description: 中国汽车品牌凌克（Lynk & Co）周三在上海车展上表示，其即将推出的 900 车型在 4 月 28 日正式上市前已收到超过 40,000 份预订单。【原文：Chinese vehicle brand Lynk & Co said at the Shanghai auto show on Wednesday that its upcoming 900 model has received over 40,000 pre-orders ahead of the official launch on April 28.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官敦促欧盟为中国产电动汽车关税争端寻求公平解决方案
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）首席执行官奥拉-凯勒纽斯（Ola Källenius）周三表示，这家德国汽车制造商正敦促欧盟找到一个 "公平的解决方案"，为中国制造的电动汽车在欧洲创造一个公平竞争的环境。【原文：Mercedes-Benz CEO Ola Källenius said on Wednesday the German automaker was urging the European Union to find an "equitable solution" to create a level-playing field for China-made electric vehicles in Europe.】

item.title: 日本央行将在第三季度加息，尽管特朗普关税将扰乱政策正常化：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，日本央行很可能在 6 月份之前维持其关键利率不变，略占多数的受访者预计日本央行将在下个季度加息 25 个基点，而不是上个月民意调查中超过三分之二的受访者预计的那样。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to hold its key interest rate through June, showed a Reuters survey of economists, with a 25-basis-point hike next quarter expected by a slight majority of respondents rather than over two-thirds in a poll last month.】

item.title: Meta 监督委员会斥责公司政策改革
item.description: Meta 平台监督委员会周三强烈谴责 Facebook 和 Instagram 的所有者在 1 月份进行的政策改革，该改革削减了事实核查，并放宽了对移民和性别认同等争议性话题讨论的限制。【原文：Meta Platforms’ Oversight Board on Wednesday sharply rebuked the Facebook and Instagram owner over a policy overhaul in January that cut fact-checking and eased curbs on discussions of contentious topics such as immigration and gender identity.】

item.title: 中国汽车制造商西克在上海车展上首次推出混合动力车型
item.description: 中国汽车制造商上海众泰周三在上海车展上首次推出了首款混合动力车型--众泰 9X 豪华 SUV。【原文：Chinese automaker Zeekr debuted its first hybrid model the Zeekr 9X luxury SUV at the Shanghai auto show on Wednesday.】

item.title: 白宫称贸易谈判步伐加快，IMF下调全球展望
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织预测，美国的国内生产总值增长率将下降整整一个百分点，仅为 1.8%。【原文：U.S. GDP growth will drop by a full percentage point to just 1.8%, the IMF forecast.】

item.title: 保时捷首席执行官表示，保时捷将于 2026 年发布中国独有的全新信息娱乐解决方案
item.description: 保时捷首席执行官奥利弗-布卢姆（Oliver Blume）在本周三的上海车展上表示，保时捷将于 2026 年发布一款中国独有的全新信息娱乐系统解决方案。【原文：Porsche will release a new infotainment solution exclusive to China in 2026, CEO Oliver Blume said at the Shanghai auto show on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国吉利将与汽车行业共享电池安全专利池
item.description: 中国汽车制造商吉利汽车周三在上海车展的媒体活动上表示，该公司计划向整个汽车行业开放其电池安全专利库。【原文：Chinese automaker Geely plans to open its pool of battery safety patents to the entire auto industry, the company said at a media event at the Shanghai auto show on Wednesday.】
